definition: row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
round/lump/ball/to roll into a ball/to gather/regiment/group/society/classifier for a lump or a soft mass: wad (of paper), ball (of wool), cloud (of smoke)

sentences.english: Chinese tour operators are notorious for bargaining down travel and hotel costs.
sentences.chinese: 中國旅行團因爲在旅行和賓館花費上砍價而臭名昭著。

sentences.english: I'd like to go on a guided tour of the city.
sentences.chinese: 我想參加導遊帶隊的旅行團來本市觀光。

sentences.english: Their next tour starts the same time as my holiday does next month.
sentences.chinese: 他們下個旅行團和我下個月的假期在同一時間。

sentences.english: I picture us like two performers on a USO Tour.
sentences.chinese: 我們覺得我們就是美國顧問協會旅行團的兩位表演者。

sentences.english: I'm gonna join a package tour to banff Canada.
sentences.chinese: 我要去參加一個旅行團去加拿大班芙公園。

sentences.english: Conventions and tours are very important to us.
sentences.chinese: 代表會議和旅行團對我們很重要。

sentences.english: Eventually, he made some money speaking to travel groups on Great Wall history.
sentences.chinese: 最終，他通過向旅行團講解長城歷史賺些錢。

sentences.english: This tour company has discount price on package holidays.
sentences.chinese: 這家旅遊公司對包價旅行團有一定的折扣。

sentences.english: Ideally, you should do this with a friend or relative, or even a group tour.
sentences.chinese: 你最好應和朋友或親戚一起，甚至參加旅行團。

sentences.english: Some of the party's luggages are lost in transit.
sentences.chinese: 旅行團的一些行李在運輸過程中丟失了。

sentences.english: South Korean tourist groups no longer travel across the heavily armed inter-Korean border.
sentences.chinese: 韓國旅行團此後不曾越過重兵駐守的朝韓邊境。

sentences.english: When traveling, I prefer package tour.
sentences.chinese: 出門旅遊我比較喜歡跟旅行團。

sentences.english: The first Chinese tour group heads to the United States in June.
sentences.chinese: 第一個中國旅行團將於今年6月抵達美國。

sentences.english: Feta, olives and tour packages won’t pay off Greece’s debts.
sentences.chinese: 羊乳酪，橄欖和旅行團無法還清希臘的債務。

sentences.english: If you don't have a car, join a group trip for the day.
sentences.chinese: 如果你沒車，可以加入一個組團旅行團打發一天。

sentences.english: He tagged on to a touring party.
sentences.chinese: 他緊跟在一個旅行團後面。

definition: round/lump/ball/to roll into a ball/to gather/regiment/group/society/classifier for a lump or a soft mass: wad (of paper), ball (of wool), cloud (of smoke)
itinerary/route/political line (e.g. right revisionist road)/CL:條|条[tiao2]
to go on a tour/to have an outing
